https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AnxsrQg05lX8jkmq07CNLgzZqbJ.jpg A workshop film made with a group of students of the Pietro Zorutti School in Palmanova, Esercizi di Cinema is an experimental adaptation of Raymond Queneau's book Exercises in Style. Cinema Exercises
